entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
